Seasons Of Code

Capture The Swag    • Akash Trehan   

WnCC - Seasons of Code

Seasons of Code is a programme launched by WnCC along the lines of the Google Summer of Code. It provides one with an opprtunity to learn and participate in a variety of interesting projects under the mentorship of the very best in our institute.

  • Learn More

List of Running Projects

  • Browser Based PDF manager
  • Resume Script Generator
  • Moodify
  • IITinder
  • Introduction to Web Development
  • (Un)Clear
  • Developing Hybrid ANN-Statistical Model for Robust Stock Market Prediction
  • Si-Phy
  • Astronomical Data-modelling and Interpretation
  • Visual Perception for Self Driving Cars
  • Convolutional Neural Networks and Applications
  • Quantum Computing Algorithms
  • Algorithm Visualizer
  • Anime Club IITB Website using Django
  • Machine Learning in Browser

Capture The Swag

[COMPLETED]

• Akash Trehan   
• Network Security

Mentees:
• Darshil Desai

Contact the Mentor:
• Facebook - Akash Trehan
• Email ID - akash.trehan123@gmail.com

Stipend:
INR 3000

60 Capture the Flag challenges in 60 days.

Challenges would get harder as the days go on. We’ll be covering all categories of challenges - Crypto, Reversing, Pwn, Forensics, Networking, Steganography etc.

Pre-requisites

Previous experience with CTFs, proficiency in Python and C/C++, should’ve done a networks course or have equivalent knowledge, knowledge of operating systems is a plus.

Proposal

Tell me about your encounters with computer security, how you developed interest in the field and what you plan to do in the future. Write about you computer science experience in general. Write about what you like about this project, how it would be useful to you and why among all applicants you should be selected. Also mention anything else you feel would help you get selected.

The Web and Coding Club

We are the coding community of IIT Bombay. WnCC is one of the biggest clubs of IIT Bombay. We believe that every individual should know how to code. Under the aegis of ITC (former STAB), we carry forward our vision of propagating the enthusiasm for coding in our institute.
